sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import Layout from "../components/Layout"; import { Table, Icon, Button, Form, Grid, Header, Message, Segment, Input, Container } from "semantic-ui-react"; import { post } from "axios"; class mailInform extends Component { exit = () => { window.close(); }; render() { this.props.history.block(); let read = () => { console.log(this.props.location.state.data); }; return ( 보내는 분 이름 {this.props.location.state.data.senderName} 연락처 {this.props.location.state.data.senderPhone} 주소 {this.props.location.state.data.senderAddress} 받는 분 이름 {this.props.location.state.data.receiverName} 연락처 {this.props.location.state.data.receiverPhone} 주소 {this.props.location.state.data.receiverAddress} 상품 정보 상품명 {this.props.location.state.data.productName} 포장수량 {this.props.location.state.data.quantity}
); } } export default mailInform;
